00051         CdcSimpleSD::CdcSimpleSD(G4String name, MyVGeometryParameter* pointer)
00052 :MySD(name, pointer)
00053 {
00054         m_GeometryParameter= dynamic_cast<CdcGeometryParameter*> (pointer);
00055         if (!m_GeometryParameter){
00056                 //              std::cout<<"In CdcSimpleSD::CdcSimpleSD, cannot get CdcGeometryParameter pointer!!!"<<std::endl;
00057                 G4Exception("CdcSimpleSD::CdcSimpleSD()",
00058                                 "InvalidSetup", FatalException,
00059                                 "cannot get CdcGeometryParameter pointer");
00060         }
00061 
00062         //name of related Digiteizer module
00063         //  CdcDigitizer* cdcDM = new CdcDigitizer("CdcDigitizer");
00064         //      MyDetectorManager::GetMyDetectorManager()->RegistorDM("CdcDigitizer");
00065         //  G4DigiManager::GetDMpointer()->AddNewModule(cdcDM);
00066 
00067         //define fTolerance
00068         fTolerance = 2.2E-6;
00069 }

00074 //-----------------------------------Initialize----------------------------------------------
00075 //Will be called by geant4 automatically at the beginning of each event
00076 void CdcSimpleSD::Initialize(G4HCofThisEvent* HCE)
00077 {
00078         int LayerNo = m_GeometryParameter->get_LayerNo();
00079         hitPointer.resize(LayerNo);
00080         for( int  i = 0; i < LayerNo; i++ ){
00081                 int CellNo = m_GeometryParameter->get_layer_cell_num(i);
00082                 hitPointer[i].resize(CellNo);
00083                 for( int j = 0; j < CellNo; j++ ){
00084                         hitPointer[i][j] = -1;
00085                 }
00086         }
00087         //initialize for root objects
00088         cdc_nHits = 0;
00089         m_x.clear();
00090         m_y.clear();
00091         m_z.clear();
00092         m_t.clear();
00093         m_px.clear();
00094         m_py.clear();
00095         m_pz.clear();
00096         m_e.clear();
00097         m_edep.clear();
00098         m_layerID.clear();
00099         m_cellID.clear();
00100         m_tid.clear();
00101         m_pid.clear();
00102         //initialize for filter
00103         nTracks = 0;
00104         prevTrackID = -100;
00105 }
00106 
00107 //-----------------------------------SetBranch----------------------------------------------
00108 //Should be called at the beginning of each run (now in MyAnalysisSvc::BeginOfRunAction())
00109 void CdcSimpleSD::SetBranch(){
00110         MyRoot* myRoot = MyRoot::GetMyRoot();
00111         G4String volName = get_VolName();
00112         if( flag_nHits ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_nHits", &cdc_nHits);
00113         if( flag_x ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_x", &m_x);
00114         if( flag_y ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_y", &m_y);
00115         if( flag_z ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_z", &m_z);
00116         if( flag_t ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_t", &m_t);
00117         if( flag_px ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_px", &m_px);
00118         if( flag_py ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_py", &m_py);
00119         if( flag_pz ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_pz", &m_pz);
00120         if( flag_e ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_e", &m_e);
00121         if( flag_edep ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_edep", &m_edep);
00122         if( flag_layerID ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_layerID", &m_layerID);
00123         if( flag_cellID ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_cellID", &m_cellID);
00124         if( flag_tid ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_tid", &m_tid);
00125         if( flag_pid ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_pid", &m_pid);
00126 }

00128 //-----------------------------------ReadOutputCard----------------------------------------------
00129 //Should be called before the begin of each run (now in the constructor of MyAnalysisSvc)
00130 void CdcSimpleSD::ReadOutputCard(G4String filename){
00131         ReSet();
00132         G4String volName = get_VolName();
00133         std::ifstream fin_card(filename);
00134         if(!fin_card){
00135                 std::cout<<"In CdcSimpleSD::ReadOutputCard, cannot open "<<filename<<"!!!"<<std::endl;
00136                 G4Exception("CdcSimpleSD::ReadOutputCard()",
00137                                 "InvalidSetup", FatalException,
00138                                 "cannot find output card");
00139         }
00140         std::stringstream buf_card;
00141         std::string s_card;
00142         int n_output_section_symbol = 0;
00143         int n_filter_section_symbol = 0;
00144         G4String BRANCHSECTIONNAME = volName + "_SECTION";
00145         G4String FILTERSECTIONNAME = volName + "_FILTERSECTION";
00146         while(getline(fin_card,s_card)){
00147                 buf_card.str("");
00148                 buf_card.clear();
00149                 buf_card<<s_card;
00150 
00151                 //eleminate useless lines
00152                 const char* c_card = s_card.c_str();
00153                 int length = strlen(c_card);
00154                 int offset = 0;
00155                 for ( ; offset < length; offset++ ){
00156                         if ( c_card[offset] != ' ' ) break;
00157                 }
00158                 if ( c_card[offset] == '#' || (c_card[offset] == '/' && c_card[offset+1] == '/') || length - offset == 0 ){
00159                         continue;
00160                 }
00161 
00162                 std::string name;
00163                 buf_card>>name;
00164                 if ( n_output_section_symbol == 0 ){
00165                         if ( name == BRANCHSECTIONNAME ){
00166                                 n_output_section_symbol++;
00167                         }
00168                 }
00169                 else if ( n_output_section_symbol == 1 ){
00170                         if ( name == BRANCHSECTIONNAME ){
00171                                 n_output_section_symbol++;
00172                         }
00173                         else if( name == "nHits" ) flag_nHits = true;
00174                         else if( name == "x" ) {flag_x = true; buf_card>>unitName_x; unit_x = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_x);}
00175                         else if( name == "y" ) {flag_y = true; buf_card>>unitName_y; unit_y = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_y);}
00176                         else if( name == "z" ) {flag_z = true; buf_card>>unitName_z; unit_z = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_z);}
00177                         else if( name == "t" ) {flag_t = true; buf_card>>unitName_t; unit_t = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_t);}
00178                         else if( name == "px" ) {flag_px = true; buf_card>>unitName_px; unit_px = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_px);}
00179                         else if( name == "py" ) {flag_py = true; buf_card>>unitName_py; unit_py = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_py);}
00180                         else if( name == "pz" ) {flag_pz = true; buf_card>>unitName_pz; unit_pz = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_pz);}
00181                         else if( name == "e" ) {flag_e = true; buf_card>>unitName_e; unit_e = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_e);}
00182                         else if( name == "edep" ) {flag_edep = true; buf_card>>unitName_edep; unit_edep = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_edep);}
00183                         else if( name == "cellID" ) flag_cellID = true;
00184                         else if( name == "layerID" ) flag_layerID = true;
00185                         else if( name == "tid" ) flag_tid = true;
00186                         else if( name == "pid" ) flag_pid = true;
00187                         else{
00188                                 std::cout<<"In CdcSimpleSD::ReadOutputCard, unknown name: "<<name<<" in file "<<filename<<std::endl;
00189                                 std::cout<<"Will ignore this line!"<<std::endl;
00190                         }
00191                 }
00192 
00193                 if ( n_filter_section_symbol == 0 ){
00194                         if ( name == FILTERSECTIONNAME ){
00195                                 n_filter_section_symbol++;
00196                         }
00197                 }
00198                 else if ( n_filter_section_symbol == 1 ){
00199                         if ( name == FILTERSECTIONNAME ){
00200                                 n_filter_section_symbol++;
00201                         }
00202                         else if( name == "Switch" ) Switch = true;
00203                         else if( name == "neutralCut" ) neutralCut = true;
00204                         else if( name == "maxn" ) buf_card>>maxn;
00205                         else if( name == "ntracks" ) buf_card>>ntracks;
00206                         else{
00207                                 G4double para;
00208                                 std::string unit;
00209                                 buf_card>>para>>unit;
00210                                 para *= MyString2Anything::get_U(unit);
00211                                 if( name == "minp" ) minp = para;
00212                                 else if ( name == "minedep" ) minedep = para;
00213                                 else if( name == "mint" ) mint = para;
00214                                 else if( name == "maxt" ) maxt = para;
00215                                 else{
00216                                         std::cout<<"In CdcSimpleSD::ReadOutputCard, unknown name: "<<name<<" in file "<<filename<<std::endl;
00217                                         std::cout<<"Will ignore this line!"<<std::endl;
00218                                 }
00219                         }
00220                 }
00221 
00222                 if ( n_output_section_symbol > 1 && n_filter_section_symbol > 1 ){
00223                         break;
00224                 }
00225         }
00226         buf_card.str("");
00227         buf_card.clear();
00228         if ( n_output_section_symbol <= 1 ){
00229                 std::cout<<"*****************WARNING********************"<<std::endl;
00230                 std::cout<<"In CdcSimpleSD::ReadOutputCard, failed to find enough section seperators for output in file "<<filename<<std::endl;
00231                 std::cout<<"Will use default settings."<<std::endl;
00232                 std::cout<<"********************************************"<<std::endl;
00233         }
00234         if ( n_filter_section_symbol<= 1 ){
00235                 std::cout<<"*****************WARNING********************"<<std::endl;
00236                 std::cout<<"In CdcSimpleSD::ReadOutputCard, failed to find enough section seperators for filter in file "<<filename<<std::endl;
00237                 std::cout<<"Will use default settings."<<std::endl;
00238                 std::cout<<"********************************************"<<std::endl;
00239         }
00240         fin_card.close();
00241         ShowOutCard();
00242 }

00244 //-----------------------------------ReSet----------------------------------------------
00245 //Private
00246 void CdcSimpleSD::ReSet(){
00247         //default output set
00248         flag_nHits = false;
00249         flag_x = false;
00250         flag_y = false;
00251         flag_z = false;
00252         flag_t = false;
00253         flag_px = false;
00254         flag_py = false;
00255         flag_pz = false;
00256         flag_e = false;
00257         flag_edep = false;
00258         flag_cellID = false;
00259         flag_layerID = false;
00260         flag_tid = false;
00261         flag_pid = false;
00262         //for fileter
00263         Switch = false;
00264         neutralCut = false;
00265         minp = 1.5*MeV;
00266         maxn = 1000;
00267         ntracks = 1;
00268         mint = 0;
00269         maxt = 0;
00270         minedep = 0;
00271 }

00273 //-----------------------------------ShowOutCard----------------------------------------------
00274 //Private
00275 void CdcSimpleSD::ShowOutCard(){
00276         std::cout<<"*************************Output settings for "<<get_VolName()<<"***************************"<<std::endl;
00277         //default output set
00278         std::cout<<"output nHits?  "<<(flag_nHits?" yes":" no")<<std::endl;
00279         std::cout<<"output x?      "<<(flag_x?" yes":" no")<<", unit: "<<unitName_x<<std::endl;
00280         std::cout<<"output y?      "<<(flag_y?" yes":" no")<<", unit: "<<unitName_y<<std::endl;
00281         std::cout<<"output z?      "<<(flag_z?" yes":" no")<<", unit: "<<unitName_z<<std::endl;
00282         std::cout<<"output t?      "<<(flag_t?" yes":" no")<<", unit: "<<unitName_t<<std::endl;
00283         std::cout<<"output px?     "<<(flag_px?" yes":" no")<<", unit: "<<unitName_px<<std::endl;
00284         std::cout<<"output py?     "<<(flag_py?" yes":" no")<<", unit: "<<unitName_py<<std::endl;
00285         std::cout<<"output pz?     "<<(flag_pz?" yes":" no")<<", unit: "<<unitName_pz<<std::endl;
00286         std::cout<<"output e?      "<<(flag_e?" yes":" no")<<", unit: "<<unitName_e<<std::endl;
00287         std::cout<<"output edep?   "<<(flag_edep?" yes":" no")<<", unit: "<<unitName_edep<<std::endl;
00288         std::cout<<"output layerID?"<<(flag_layerID?" yes":" no")<<std::endl;
00289         std::cout<<"output cellID? "<<(flag_cellID?" yes":" no")<<std::endl;
00290         std::cout<<"output tid?    "<<(flag_tid?" yes":" no")<<std::endl;
00291         std::cout<<"output pid?    "<<(flag_pid?" yes":" no")<<std::endl;
00292         //for fileter
00293         std::cout<<"Switch on?     "<<(Switch?" yes":" no")<<std::endl;
00294         std::cout<<"neutralCut on? "<<(neutralCut?"yes":"no")<<std::endl;
00295         std::cout<<"minp =         "<<minp/MeV<<"MeV"<<std::endl;
00296         std::cout<<"maxn =         "<<maxn<<std::endl;
00297         std::cout<<"ntracks =      "<<ntracks<<std::endl;
00298         std::cout<<"mint =         "<<mint/ns<<"ns"<<std::endl;
00299         std::cout<<"maxt =         "<<maxt/ns<<"ns"<<std::endl;
00300         std::cout<<"minedep =      "<<minedep/MeV<<"MeV"<<std::endl;
00301         std::cout<<"VerboseLevel = "<<get_VerboseLevel()<<std::endl;
00302         std::cout<<"******************************************************************************"<<std::endl;
00303 }
00304 
00305 //-----------------------------------ProcessHits----------------------------------------------
00306 //Will be called by geant4 automatically everytime a step in CdcSimpleSD generated
00307 G4bool CdcSimpleSD::ProcessHits(G4Step* aStep,G4TouchableHistory* touchableHistory)
00308 {
00309 
00310         //*************************get useful variables***********************
00311 
00312         int status;
00313         // get track info
00314         G4Track* gTrack = aStep->GetTrack() ;
00315         G4int trackID= gTrack->GetTrackID(); //G4 track ID of current track.
00316         G4double globalT=gTrack->GetGlobalTime();//Time since the event in which the track belongs is created
00317         G4int charge = gTrack->GetDefinition()->GetPDGCharge();
00318         G4int pid = gTrack->GetDefinition()->GetPDGEncoding();
00319 
00320         // get information at the beginning and at the end of step
00321         G4StepPoint* prePoint  = aStep->GetPreStepPoint() ;
00322         G4double total_e = prePoint->GetTotalEnergy();
00323         G4ThreeVector pointIn_mom = prePoint->GetMomentum();
00324         G4double pointIn_pa = pointIn_mom.mag();
00325         G4ThreeVector pointIn_pos = prePoint->GetPosition();
00326         G4double pointIn_time = prePoint->GetGlobalTime();//Time since the event in which the track belongs is created
00327 
00328         // get step info
00329         G4double edep = aStep->GetTotalEnergyDeposit();
00330 
00331         // get layerId and cellId
00332         const G4VTouchable *touchable = prePoint->GetTouchable();
00333         G4int ReplicaNo = touchable->GetReplicaNumber(0);
00334         G4int layerId, cellId;
00335         status = m_GeometryParameter->get_layerIdcellId(ReplicaNo, &layerId, &cellId);
00336         if(status){
00337                 std::cout<<"In CdcSimpleSD::ProcessHits(), unknown ReplicaNo = "<<ReplicaNo<<"!!! Will not generate hit"<<std::endl;
00338                 return false;
00339         }
00340 
00341         //*************************filter***********************
00342         //switch
00343         if (!Switch) return false;
00344         CDCSD_LINEINFO();
00345 
00346         //ntracks
00347         if ( trackID != prevTrackID ){
00348                 prevTrackID = trackID;
00349                 nTracks++;
00350         }
00351         if ( nTracks > ntracks && ntracks) return false;
00352         CDCSD_LINEINFO();
00353 
00354         //maxn
00355         if ( maxn && cdc_nHits >= maxn ) return false;
00356         CDCSD_LINEINFO();
00357 
00358         //minp
00359         if ( minp && pointIn_pa < minp ) return false;
00360         CDCSD_LINEINFO();
00361 
00362         //time_window
00363         if(isnan(globalT)){
00364                 G4cout<<"CdcSimpleSD:error, globalT is nan "<<G4endl;
00365                 return false;
00366         }
00367         CDCSD_LINEINFO();
00368         if ( globalT < mint && mint ) return false;
00369         CDCSD_LINEINFO();
00370         if ( globalT > maxt && maxt ) return false;
00371         CDCSD_LINEINFO();
00372 
00373         //neutralCut
00374         if ( charge == 0 && neutralCut ) return false;
00375         CDCSD_LINEINFO();
00376 
00377         //edep
00378         if( edep <= minedep ) return false;
00379         CDCSD_LINEINFO();
00380 
00381         if ( get_VerboseLevel() >= 5 ){
00382                 std::cout<<"in layer["<<layerId<<"], the track hit cell["<<cellId<<"]"<<std::endl;
00383         }
00384 
00385         //*************************calculate hitPosition****************************
00386         G4ThreeVector hitPosition(0.,0.,0.);
00387         hitPosition = pointIn_pos;
00388 
00389         //*******************generate or modify hit************************
00390         if (hitPointer[layerId][cellId] == -1){
00391                 CDCSD_LINEINFO();
00392                 hitPointer[layerId][cellId]=cdc_nHits;
00393                 //Set for root objects
00394                 if(flag_x) m_x.push_back(hitPosition.x()/unit_x);
00395                 if(flag_y) m_y.push_back(hitPosition.y()/unit_y);
00396                 if(flag_z) m_z.push_back(hitPosition.z()/unit_z);
00397                 if(flag_t) m_t.push_back(globalT/unit_t);
00398                 if(flag_px) m_px.push_back(pointIn_mom.x()/unit_px);
00399                 if(flag_py) m_py.push_back(pointIn_mom.y()/unit_py);
00400                 if(flag_pz) m_pz.push_back(pointIn_mom.z()/unit_pz);
00401                 if(flag_e) m_e.push_back(total_e/unit_e);
00402                 if(flag_edep) m_edep.push_back(edep/unit_edep);
00403                 if(flag_layerID) m_layerID.push_back(layerId);
00404                 if(flag_cellID) m_cellID.push_back(cellId);
00405                 if(flag_tid) m_tid.push_back(trackID);
00406                 if(flag_pid) m_pid.push_back(pid);
00407                 cdc_nHits++;
00408         }
00409         return true;
00410 }

00414 void CdcSimpleSD::EndOfEvent(G4HCofThisEvent*){
